API Endpoints

JSON Endpoint

GET /api/json - Retrieves a list of items in JSON format.

POST /api/json - Adds a new item.
{ "name": "John Doe", "email": "johndoe@example.com" }

PATCH /api/json/user/:userId - Updates specified fields of a user's data.
{ "name": "Updated Name", "email": "updated.email@example.com" }

DELETE /api/json/user/:userId - Deletes the user data for the specified user ID.

OPTIONS /api/json - Provides information about the HTTP methods supported by the /api/json endpoint.
